Similar to the [[Drunken Fist]], the user harnesses the queasiness caused to them by [[wikipedia:motion sickness|motion sickness]] to lend them a degree of unpredictability in combat. They can also vomit on their opponent in order to totally gross them out.

[[fr:Poing du Mal de Mer]]
[[pt-br:Punho Enjoado]]
